price: Na wanao jitahidi kuzipinga Ishara zetu, wakaona watashinda, hao watahudhurishwa kwenye adhabu.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡعَوۡنَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ
footnotes: Na hao ambao wana fanya juhudi kuzipinga Ishara zetu, wakifanya kila hila kuzivunja na kuwazuia Manabii wetu wasifikishe Ujumbe wake, hao, basi watakuwa katika adhabu, wamehudhurishwa na wala hawataepuka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yasʿawna fī āyātinā muʿājizīna ulāika fī al-ʿadhābi muḥ'ḍarūna
